name: Cook, Rabbit, Cook!
description:
A PSX-inspired horror game where a nest of rabbits find themselves forced to cook a hearty stew - unawares that they are soon to become a key ingredient!

You have to escape granny's house without becoming ensnared by the sinister overgrown roots, but will you be able to save your friends too?

their fate lies in your fuzzy paws...

This game was made with Unity for Global Game Jam 2023 over a weekend.

Credits

Scripting, Level Design - High-Terrain Obi-Wan (Oliver Hill)

Audio and Voice Over - LukeE (Luke Evans)

3D modelling and 2D assets - DollDirectorDavies (Courtney Davies)

Assets used

PSX Shader Kit by Valerie Moza on unity store

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/psx-shader-kit-183591

Tourian Entrance by The Versions (arranged from Super Metroid)

"ps1 tsyle low-poly average student table" (https://skfb.ly/oqDn7) by Madeleinone

"Aaron project - Roots" (https://skfb.ly/6WWKH) by artikora
